description:
This 60 Day Hypnotherapy Online Programme for Weight Loss is a unique combination of Video, Audio and Workbook Tutorials.

This programme has a structured process that you will be required to follow, and you will need to set aside one hour a week to complete the weekly workbook, and also listen to the 30min audio track every night as you fall asleep. (You don't have to stay awake to listen to it, you need to play it as you fall asleep.)

This Online Hypnotherapy Programme for Weight Loss is for you if you have struggled with your weight in the past and you find it hard to stay motivated and on the right track.

You will learn the following skills:

  • How to set your goals for yourself
  • How to stay on the right track
  • How to make proper choices
  • How to remain motivated
  • How to build new habits into your life

Once you begin the programme it is designed for you to use the Videos once a week, ideally the same day every week and the audio track every night.

The workbook is for you to download and print out to keep track of your progress.

Results do vary person to person. We see excellent results if the programme is followed exactly as it is designed. You will have lifetime access to the Programme, so you will be able to repeat is as often as you want to.
title: Learn how to Lose Weight and Feel Great with Hypnosis
